channel.title: Rstudio on e-Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Rstudio on e-Notes

item.title: Instalasi RStudio Server
item.description: Tambahkan repo R echo "deb http://cran.rstudio.com/bin/linux/ubuntu xenial/" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list gpg --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-key E084DAB9 gpg -a --export E084DAB9 | sudo apt-key add - sudo apt update Install R sudo apt install r-base Install RStudio Server sudo apt install gdebi-core wget https://download2.rstudio.org/rstudio-server-1.1.383-amd64.deb sudo gdebi rstudio-server-1.1.383-amd64.deb RStudio dapat diakses pada laman http://localhost:8787.
